mapper.insert: insert into db_forumlist (SEQUENCEID, FORUMNAME, IFPARENT, PARENTID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, DESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{forumname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ifparent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_forumlist set FORUMNAME = #{forumname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IFPARENT = #{ifparent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENTID = #{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPENFLAG = #{openflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, FORUMNAME, IFPARENT, PARENTID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, DESCR from db_forumlist where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, FORUMNAME, IFPARENT, PARENTID, OPENFLAG, OPER, OPERTIME, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, DESCR from db_forumlist
